title: Storm set to bring extreme cold, freezing rain to Midwest | Video | actionnewsnow.com
text:
Storm set to bring extreme cold, freezing rain to Midwest
- Updated
[0](https://www.actionnewsnow.com/video/storm-set-to-bring-extreme-cold-freezing-rain-to-midwest/video_2f72e817-02d2-50a2-bb68-bb6ca8fc80f1.html#comments)
Weather Alert
...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Carquinez Strait and Delta, Central Sacramento Valley, Northern Sacramento Valley, and Southern Sacramento Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects. &&
